title: Design and prototype robotic arm for brick placement
description: Develop a design for the robotic arm that will handle bricks and position them accurately.

title: Develop robotic arm control software
description: Write the software that will control the movement and positioning of the robotic arm.
dependencies: Design and prototype robotic arm for brick placement

title: Develop robotic arm gripper design
description: Create a design for the gripper that will hold and release bricks.
dependencies: Design and prototype robotic arm for brick placement

title: Create a system for brick selection and delivery
description: Develop a system that will automatically select bricks of the appropriate size and deliver them to the robotic arm.
dependencies: Design and prototype robotic arm for brick placement

title: Research and implement concrete pouring automation
description: Investigate methods for automated concrete pouring and develop a solution for the robots.

title: Design and develop safety mechanisms for the robots
description: Create a design for the safety features that will prevent accidents during construction.

title: Test and refine robots' construction capabilities
description: Conduct tests to ensure the robots can perform their tasks accurately and safely.
dependencies: Design and prototype robotic arm for brick placement
Create a system for brick selection and delivery
Research and implement concrete pouring automation
